itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Bloody Tree Knot requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Grade 1 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.
